resources.string: Allows to perform actions such as Back

For the app to work it needs permissions only available to system apps, therefore the app must be installed as a system app 
 
For the app to correctly display itself Android software navigation buttons must be hidden, to hide them locate and edit build.prop and add the following line qemu.hw.mainkeys=1 and reboot your system. 
 
The app uses an accessibility service to capture keyboard input, if that service is crashed you might need to re-enable it and/or restart the system. 
 
Note: This app is developed with the hope it is found useful but without any warranty
